content: across round 2 sl1 then p across remaining stitches repeat these two row until heel flap is as long as it is wide ending ready to work a knit row turn heel row 1 knit half of the heel flap stitches k2 k2togbl k1 turn row 2 sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl1 k to within 1 stitch of gap k2togbl k1 turn row 4 sl1 p to within 1 stitch of gap p2tog p1 turn continue in this manner always working together the two stitches on each side of the gap until all stitches are knitted and you are ending having finished a knit row golden gardens socks | fairlight fibers | fairlightfibers com pick-up instep stitches with right side still facing pick up 1 stitch in every slipped stitch along edge of heel flap for a neater line of instep stitches twist the stitches as you pick them up by knitting into the back of the loop pick up one or two extra stitches in the gap between the slipped heel stitches and the instep stitches place a stitch marker p3k6 rib across top of foot place another stitch marker pick up the same number of stitches along the right edge of the heel as on the left edge you will now be working in plain stockinette on the sides and bottom of the foot and ribbing the top 30 stitches between the markers in p3k6 rib k 1 round in pattern with the ribbing across the top 30 stitches instep shaping round 1 knit to last 2 stitches before stitch marker k2tog work in p3k6 pattern across to the next stitch marker k2togbl k to the end of the round round 2 knit to marker work pattern between markers knit to end of round repeat rounds 1 and 2 reducing by 2 stitches on every other round until you have your original cast- on number of stitches again work foot work in established pattern knit until marker work p3k6 rib to next marker knit to end of round until you reach the ball of the foot about 3 less than desired length you can remove the stitch markers on the sides once you feel comfortable in the pattern when you are at the ball of the foot or 3 less than desired length discontinue ribbing and work toe chart twice across all 60 stitches knit 3 rounds plain and begin toe by replacing stitch markers if you removed them after 15 stitches and after 45 stitches shape toe round 1 knit to within 3 stitches of first stitch marker k2tog k1 from there k1 k2togbl knit to within 3 stitches of next stitch marker k2tog k1 from there k1 k2togbl knit to end of round round 2 knit across all stitches repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have half your original stitches remaining now work decrease row round 1 every round until 8 stitches remain cut yarn leaving a generous tail for weaving in
